data.title: Apply to George Fox University
data.meta_description: George Fox is Oregon's largest private university, providing students with personal attention, global opportunities to learn and serve, and a supportive community that encourages academic rigor and spiritual growth. We offer more than 60 academic courses of study, including nationally accredited nursing, engineering and education programs, and more than 4,000 students call us home. We are the top-ranked Christian college in the state (The Wall Street Journal).
data.text:
First-year students are applicants who have attempted less than 30 quarter/20 semester credits after high school (for applicants currently in high school, the credit threshold does not apply). A high school transcript is required for admission, and SAT or ACT scores are optional.

Application Deadlines:

Nov. 1 (Early Action)

Feb. 1 (Priority Decision)

My time at Fox has been such a transformative experience. Before coming here, I was more reserved and felt out of place. I discovered a community here and friendships that will last. I will always remember the kindness of each person I came in contact with. The professors have truly shown what it means to Be Known and to be encouraged and supported in my academics and personal life.
